trans-unit.source: Represents the base type for all expressions.
No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
Implements the visitor pattern for expressions that do not produce a result value.
An instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor"></xref>.
Implements the visitor pattern for expressions that produce a result value of a specific type.
An instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor"></xref>.
The type of the result produced by visitor.
The type of the result produced by <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to the current DbExpression instance.
The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref>.
`True` if the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to the current DbExpression instance; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the kind of the expression, which indicates the operation of this expression.
The kind of the expression, which indicates the operation of this expression.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified binary value, which may be **null**
The binary value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified binary value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) Boolean value.
The Boolean value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified Boolean value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) byte value.
The byte value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified byte value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> value.
The DateTime value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified DateTime value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) <xref href="System.DateTimeOffset"></xref> value.
The DateTimeOffset value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified DateTimeOffset value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) decimal value.
The decimal value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified decimal value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) double value.
The double value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified double value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified <xref href="System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography"></xref> value, which may be null.
The DbGeography value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified DbGeography value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified <xref href="System.Data.Spatial.DbGeometry"></xref> value, which may be null.
The DbGeometry value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified DbGeometry value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> value.
The Guid value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified Guid value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) Int16 value.
The Int16 value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified Int16 value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) Int32 value.
The Int32 value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified Int32 value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) Int64 value.
The Int64 value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified Int64 value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified (nullable) Single value.
The Single value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified Single value.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified string value.
The string value on which the returned expression should be based.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that represents the specified string value.
Serves as a hash function for the type.
A hash code for the current expression.
Gets the type metadata for the result type of the expression.
The type metadata for the result type of the expression.
